query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM live_streams) as total_streams,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM live_streams WHERE status = 'live') as live_streams,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM live_stream_tips) as total_tips,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM live_stream_tips WHERE status = 'pending') as pending_tips,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE cashappHandle IS NOT NULL OR paypalEmail IS NOT NULL) as users_with_payout
